name: Science
victoryString: You have achieved victory through mastery of Science! You have conquered the mysteries of nature and led your people on a voyage to a brave new world! Your triumph will be remembered as long as the stars burn in the night sky!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Domination
victoryScreenHeader: Destroy all enemies or affiliates or allies of the enemies to win
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Time
milestones: Have highest score after max turns
victoryString: You are surpass the world by a margin, all the course of history will be written, and you have secured your civilization's seat in history. You are victorious.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Culture
victoryString: You have achieved through the awesome power of your Culture. Your nation's greatness - the magnificence of its monuments and the power of its artifacts - have astounded the world! Poets will honor you as long as beauty brings gladness to a weary heart.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Diplomacy
milestones: Being voted as the world leader with a majority.
victoryString: You have triumph over your foes through the art of Diplomacy! Your cunning and wisdom have earned your great friends - and divided and sown confusion among your enemies! Forever will you be remembered as the leader who brought peace into this weary world!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Economy
victoryScreenHeader: Having the most golds in the World
victoryString: You have triumph over your foes through the art of Economics. With your funds, you have won the vast riches that the world can harnesses with. Through the World Bank, you have make sure everyone have something to rely on. You shall be remembered as the leader who brings joy and happiness through money and economics!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!
